Chula_Vista.Mattress Firm Amphitheatre: The Mattress Firm Amphitheatre (formerly known as the Sleep Train Amphitheatre, Coors Amphitheatre and the Cricket Wireless Amphitheatre) is a 20,500-seat amphitheatre located in Chula Vista, California. It is one of the larger concert venues in the San Diego area. The venue is currently owned and operated by Live Nation.
